snippet: In Silicon Valley, wearing flashy socks is more than an expression of your personality. It signals that you are part of the in crowd.
abstract: In Silicon Valley, wearing flashy socks is more than an expression of your personality. It signals that you are part of the in crowd.
lead_paragraph: In Silicon Valley, where the uniform - jeans, hoodies and flip-flops - is purposefully nonchalant, and where no one would be caught dead in a tie, wearing flashy socks is more than an expression of your personality. It signals that you are part of the in crowd, report Claire Cain Miller and Nick Bilton. It's like a secret handshake for those who have arrived, and for those who want to. Read more »

headline.main: A Foot in the Door in Silicon Valley
